Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Anti-Infective Agent/Topical Anti-Infective Agent/Dakins Solution
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A highly diluted solution of sodium hypochlorite (0.5% w/v) with topical anti-infective activity. Dakin's solution is used as an antiseptic to clean infected topical wounds.
